name: Joshua Simmons
text: Staton Correctional Faclity is one of the better prisons in the ALDOC, as far as living conditions, inmate economy, leniency, & activities for the inmates... However, Staton Correctional also has a horrible side to it as well. It has become very Violent, dangerous, & corrupt recently. The staff members are noticeably racist toward white inmates, able to be bribed with money, & under qualified, poorly trained, unprofessional officers of the law. It is now one of the top 5 most violent prisons in AL, & several deaths, stabbings, & sexual assaults occur all the time. Overall, Staton Correctional Faclity would be my top choice of I were to have to return to prison & be incarcerated again.

name: FlySouth Gangsta
text: Club staton

name: Van Damage
text: Seriously?!

name: Melanie Tyzzer
text: Small prison. Officers are rude. Very abusive officers, as well.

name: Melanie Tyzzer
text: I have visited every prison, to visit the inmates. This is by far the best. The police were so nice and always smiling.  The inmates looks like they are happy their, and barley sees stabbings there.

name: Joseph Breault
text: My mother was dropped off on 20Jun2017. I sent money the same day thru money gram. I have been trying to see if she had received the money yet. I called the facility on multiple occasions and have talked to my mom's lawyer to see if everything was ok with my mother. Today 22Jun2017 I received three calls two from a private number and a cell phone number. Didn't get to answer I was at work. The cell phone that called texted me and the text said inorder to send money to your mother I would have to go thru western union and gave me a inmate number which was not my mother's. I called the number back and a lady answered and was telling me the only way I could get money to my mom would be western union which I know is not true. I told her the inmate number was not my mom's and she said her friend gave her the information. I told her there is some shady stuff going on and hung up. I called the prison and told the representative that answered the phone about the shady encounter. The representative put me on hold and after like 15 minutes I got tried of waiting and hung up. Then I called back several times and nobody answered at the facility. Finally I received a call from someone from the facility that allowed my mom to call from there account. And was told by my mom that she hadn't received the money and that is why her cell mate let her call from her account. So I went back to were I sent the money gram and they verified the transaction was held and now since it was being verified they would release it to the account. I called the facility back several times and nobody still answered. Finally about five hours later somebody from the facility answered and I asked them if I could verify my mom received the funds he told me that everybody that could help was gone and call back tomorrow. The point is I'm getting a bad feeling about the integrity of the staff here. Nobody seems to care about somebody trying to scam me into sending them money and how they got my mom's information. Pretty disgusted and will not stop until I get some answers from somebody that is competent.

name: Alice Fox
text: free them

name: Angie Lane
text: The family enjoyed visiting Winston County's oldest public building.

name: Cassandra Naylor
text: I absolutely love how well preserved this building was.  Wonderful piece of history.

name: Jackie Flowers
text: Well worth a stop if you are in the area. Well preserved and easy access. No admission fee, but you can donate if you want to.  Best to include as a stop while in the Bankhead National Forrest area. Close to many other local areas of interest.

name: King James
text: Awesome! WIllis Farris is my 4th great grandfather...had to see this passing through Alabama. Go to Chef Troys across the street for a great meal!

name: Kai Hamm
text: Cool little house to see the oldest log jail still standing in Alabama, good for a 10 minute stop

name: butterbeankimgof4round Esch
text: It is something to see once.fast stop and look around

name: Danny Rivers
text: Just a wonderful picnicing place for friends and family...

name: William Hicks
text: Great historical moment

name: Damian Duncan
text: Here is an idea... if you don't like jail then try not breaking the law.

name: william smith
text: Processing is waaaaay to slow

name: doanie beeler
text: I was bonding someone out unfortunately, but the real unfortunate part of the tale: I spent 16 hours while the MCSO staff rudely ignored me and never had an answer for my questions. I'm all for backing the blue, but this department needs a lesson on politely dealing with citizens who arent breaking the law. They are BY FAR the rudest OFFICERS I HAVE EVER ENCOUNTERED.

name: Bradley Kelso
text: the food was terrible  some black guy named tyrone stole my sweet kicks. i had to use the bathroom in front of everyone. by far the worst place ive ever been

name: Melissa Ohlrich
text: The staff really need to be put in here and let the inmates loose on them. They are the worst people I've ever encountered  (as a visitor).

name: Anthony Cornelius
text: Their five star service won't leave you disappointed. The many amenities that are offered is astounding. From the Olympic size pool, luxury spa, to free WIFI it can't be beat. Don't forget to try the room service.

name: Nan Messer
text: Haven't been there yet.  My son is there  : /  But after a year of my Son being incarcerated at Limestone Correctional Facility, WOW 😥😨😰 The prisoners, I feel are treated so inhumanly ! The Food, if that's what they call it !

name: Jt Lyncharts
text: The staff failed to ressucitate an inmate after a heart attack, state is trying to hide it. Their staff and warden deserve to sit behind the bars they work.

name: Jamie Contreras
text: My husband is there and he has witness 5 stabings and seen someone OD right in front of him and there Staff did nothing he said there’s so many drugs in there it’s crazy terrible run place worse place you’d wanna end up

name: Nitro Sims
text: It is not fun to live there...

name: Spicey Rat
text: Amazing! Prison guards were kind the food was pleasant and the beds were so soft! I had a great time I made lots of friend's   all I had to pay was second degree robbery. My only complaint was I couldn't stay longer

name: Ron S
text: I am a bondsman and they get my people out fast.

name: Brad Pike
text: Employees are rude and would rather talk than do their job. I have never seen a jail ran so poorly.

name: Nit k
text:
This is the worst place ever the staff is so rude and they will not help you at all it feels like somebody has pushed them to work here .
I hope no one ends up in the care of these people

name: Jamie Robinson
text: When I 1st arrive the young lady DID help me out but she SOON left & the lady was SO so SLOW & just didn't want to do anything!

name: Douglas Benefield
text: I am not reviewing this as a inmate or a detainee at the county jail but rather as a doordash delivery man there the deputies and dispatch people are always very nice when I bring food there and I tip average layer above everything. I'm sure they do a good job in there and I don't really want to know if they do or not LOL but here's to the boys in blue and doordash
